task_name: Check the status of your iPhone repair on apple.

description.thought: To check the status of an iPhone repair on Apple's website, I need to go to the Apple support website and likely need to sign in with my Apple ID.  I don't have an accessibility tree yet, so I'll start by navigating to the Apple support page.
description.action: Navigating to Apple's support website (https://support.apple.com/) to initiate the iPhone repair status check.
